query:
SELECT p.id, p.name, p.color, p.size, p.price, p.currency, pc.name as category_name, p.last_seen_at
FROM products p
LEFT JOIN product_categories pc ON p.category_id = pc.id
ORDER BY p.last_seen_at DESC
LIMIT 10;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2LSjgciXE5U7gJN.root --database AE5tzfuADY2nWPRKhfHJC3 --execute SELECT p.id, p.name, p.color, p.size, p.price, p.currency, pc.name as category_name, p.last_seen_at
FROM products p
LEFT JOIN product_categories pc ON p.category_id = pc.id
ORDER BY p.last_seen_at DESC
LIMIT 10;
